channel.title: Music – Lyn Lapid
channel.description: Recent content in Lyn Lapid on Music

item.title: Lyn Lapid - Detached
item.description:
I’ve been here for three nights
Forgetting what it used to be like
To sleep in and not hear you breathing
You life is so easy to be in
If we could just freeze time
Pretend that you have always been mine
The second I leave you, we’re all done
Go back to pretending I’m no one

[Pre-Chorus]
I’m wondering how
I’m everything and then nothing

[Chorus]
How are you so detached?
When I’m outta your sight I’m outta your mind
Forget what we had
From so in the present to stuck in thе past
How are you so detached?

[Verse 2]
I don’t wanna lеave you tomorrow
‘Cause when I leave you never follow
This object ain’t permanent, is it?
‘Cause when it’s not there you don’t miss it
Swear there was a red string
Connecting a piece of you to me
But I’m guessing I just misread that
I heard that can happen with contact

[Pre-Chorus]
I’m wondering how
I’m everything and then nothing

[Chorus]
How are you so detached?
When I’m outta your sight I’m outta your mind
Forget what we had
From so in the present to stuck in the past
How are you so detached?

How are you so detached?
How are you so detached?
How are you so detached?
How are you so detached?

item.title: Lyn Lapid - In My Mind
item.description:
Quiet as the city air on a summer night
after it rains
Faster than a bolt of lightning
The speed of a Japanese bullet train(Train)
And you know
it’s always trying stay awake(Stay awake)
Oh but darling running ain’t enough
to escape from
The monsters in my brain(In my brain)
People say I’m quiet most of the time
If only you knew what goes on in my mind ahh
(If only you knew if only you knew)
What goes on in my mind ahh
(If only you knew if only you knew)
(I’m not toxic I swear)
2 in the mornin’ I’m lyin’ awake(Awake)
These thoughts in my brain
they come out to play(Play)
I’m replaying Gumball to keep ’em away
Deep in the silence may end up violent
What an anomaly
what is so wrong with me?(Me)
People say I’m quiet most of the time
If only you knew what goes on in my mind ahh
(If only you knew if only you knew)
What goes on in my mind ahh
(If only you knew if only you knew)
(If only you knew if only you knew)
What goes on in my what goes on in my
(If only you knew if only you knew)
What goes on in my mind
(If only you knew if only you knew)
What goes on in my what goes on in my
(If only you knew if only you knew)
What goes on in my what goes on in my mind
